about_the_game:
"the Secret of Rooms" is a drama-oriented puzzle-solving game in a modern setting.

[Gameplay]

You wake up at the door of a strange room and get a phone call from your boss, urging you to investigate the disappearance of a female reporter that has caused a sensation in the city.
During the investigation, you are in a bizarre room cycle. In a room with distinctive human characteristics, look for clues, crack the secret room, restore the story that happened to them.Eventually, the world thread reveals the creepy secrets.



Just after you think you find the truth, the unexpected reversal happened......
Who exactly is the "you" ——?

[Features of the game]

♦ puzzle does not hurt the brain, the brain does not move gas; novice veteran, fondly.
♦ volt line thousands of miles, free weaving plot, script kill like the reduction type puzzle solving new experience.
♦The graphics are clean and simple, refuse to be flashy, and return to the essence of the puzzle game.
♦ Countless little Easter eggs, full mark in details!
detailed_description:
About our team

Hi. We’re 3 people who are really really into murder mysteries. So much so that despite being scrubs, we made an escape room game in our spare time. We had so much fun that we thought, what the heck… let's throw it out on the internet for a roasting. Thus, NoFace Studio was born. We call ourselves NoFace cause where we’re from, face = respectability, and as wannabe developers, we’re pretty low on the industry totem pole. Maybe in a few years we’ll put out a lootbox-ridden grindfest and change our name to thick face studio /s. Until then we are NoFace Studio and you can follow our story by searching for The Secret of Room on WeChat, Weibo, Bilibili and Facebook, or commiserate with other The Secret of Room players in our QQ group: 609847577

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7sp1 or Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E6550 or AMD equivalent or above
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GT440（512M）or AMD Radeon equivalent or above
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7sp1 or Windows 10
  • Processor: CPU i3-2320 or AMD FX-6300 Six-Core Processor(3500 MHz) equivalent or above
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660 Ti or Radeon(TM) RX 460 Graphics equivalent or above
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
